# tc

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

the `tc` package includes frequently used essential functions for processing and formatting data.

## Installation

You can install the development version of tc from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("tori-cowger/tc")
devtools::install_github("tori-cowger/tc")
```

## Example

Example of using the `%ni%` function, which is the opposite of `%in%`

```{r example}
library(tc)
## Function for excluding items from filtering/lists
mtcars |> dplyr::filter(gear %ni% 1:4) |> dplyr::select(cyl, gear)

```
